title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a bowl, mix eggs with grated cheese.
Combine cooked spaghetti with egg mixture.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt, lemon juice, garlic, ginger, and spices.
Prepare gravy by cooking tomato paste with spices and cream.
Add grilled chicken to the gravy and simmer until flavors meld.

title: Doro Wot
summary: A spicy Ethiopian chicken stew made with berbere spice mix and served with injera.
instructions: Prepare the chicken and marinate with spices.
Cook onions, garlic, and ginger in butter.
Add tomato paste and berbere spice mix.
Combine with chicken and simmer until cooked.
